statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, consultation_reason FROM appointments WHERE follow_up = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 200 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, consultation_reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, consultation_reason FROM appointments WHERE follow_up = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING appointment_count > 3 ORDER BY appointment_count DESC
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_appointments BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY doctor_id
SELECT MAX(appointment_date) as latest_appointment_date, MIN(appointment_date) as earliest_appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 201
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE id = 1
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 2
SELECT appointment_type, status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled'
SELECT * FROM follow_up_appointments WHERE followup_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 1 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Consultation' AND status = 'Confirmed' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, appointment_date, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND status = 'Pending' ORDER BY doctor_id, appointment_date;

SELECT appointments.id, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.status, follow_up_appointments.followup_date, follow_up_appointments.followup_notes FROM appointments INNER JOIN follow_up_appointments ON appointments.id = follow_up_appointments.appointment_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Confirmed' AND follow_up_appointments.followup_status = 'Completed';
SELECT DISTINCT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING appointment_count > 5 ORDER BY doctor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_contact FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_id, consultation_type FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT follow_up_id, appointment_id, follow_up_date, follow_up_reason FROM follow_up_appointments WHERE follow_up_reason LIKE '%follow-up%';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, appointments.appointment_date, patients.patient_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointments.doctor_id = 1;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, appointments.consultation_type, follow_up_appointments.follow_up_date FROM appointments LEFT JOIN follow_up_appointments ON appointments.appointment_id = follow_up_appointments.appointment_id WHERE follow_up_appointments.follow_up_date >= NOW() ORDER BY follow_up_appointments.follow_up_date ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_name HAVING total_appointments > 1 ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type, follow_up_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN follow_ups ON appointments.appointment_id = follow_ups.appointment_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Check-up' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_contact FROM doctors;
SELECT appointment_id, scheduled_date, appointment_type FROM appointments ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;

SELECT consult.doctor_id, consult.diagnosis, doc.doctor_name, pat.patient_name
FROM consultations AS consult
JOIN doctors AS doc
ON consult.doctor_id = doc.doctor_id
JOIN appointments AS app
ON consult.appointment_id = app.appointment_id
JOIN patients AS pat
ON app.patient_id = pat.patient_id
WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND patient_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, appointment_id ASC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_contact LIKE '%123%'
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date, diagnosis FROM consultations
